tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE GeneticData (
  data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  genetic_info TEXT,
  data_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  dob DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  genetic_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE medications (
  medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage FLOAT,
  frequency VARCHAR(20),
  patient_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patients_data (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender CHAR(1),
  patient_dob DATE
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_info (
  genetic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients_data(patient_id),
  genetic_sequence TEXT,
  gene_affected VARCHAR(50),
  mutation_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE research_data (
  research_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  genetic_id INT REFERENCES genetic_info(genetic_id),
  research_date DATE,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
  research_topic VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE therapy_data (
  therapy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  genetic_id INT REFERENCES genetic_info(genetic_id),
  therapy_type VARCHAR(50),
  therapy_duration INT,
  prescription_date DATE
)
